name: bitesize-cursai-plugin
description: Custom WordPress plugin for Bitesize Irish Cúrsaí membership site

scripts.build: npm run version:bump && npm run build:audio
scripts.build:audio: npm run build:audio:js && npm run build:audio:css
scripts.build:dev: npm run lint:php && npm run build:audio:dev
scripts.build:audio:dev: npm run build:audio:js:dev && npm run build:audio:css:dev
scripts.lint:php:fix: echo 'PHP syntax errors must be fixed manually. Check the files listed above.'
scripts.pre-deploy: npm run lint:php && npm run build
scripts.version: npm run pre-deploy && npm run version:bump

author: Bitesize Irish
